author: Francis X. Rocca
title: Pope Benedict Protects Pope Francis’ Right Flank
text:
ROME—The reign of Pope Francis, which reached its five-year point on Tuesday, has been marked by contrasts in style and substance with that of his predecessor Pope Benedict XVI—most controversially, in the current pope’s more lenient approach to divorce.
But in comments published Monday, retired Pope Benedict played down differences with his successor as a matter of “foolish prejudice,” and insisted on an “interior continuity” between them.
...
